::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus is also blown backward and scortched. Just as he gets back up he sees that Cyclonus had fired a missile of his own. Rodimus is quick to react and fires at it with his wrist mounted lasers. The rocket is still closer to Cyclonus then Rodimus.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus stumbles back as the blast had taken his right hand off. He
 > holds the end of his right arm where the hand used to be as sparks
 > fly from the wound.
 > 
 > Rodimus: Gahh! No honor among you... Then I'll do this your way!
 > 
 > Rodimsu replaces the hand with the extending buzzsaw he has on that
 > limb. He jumps at Cyclonus as if he was to slash him with the saw but
 > it is a ruse. While close to his enemy, Rodimus activates one of his
 > rockets which swings up over his right shoulder and launches at
 > Cyclonus. Rodimus was willing to take himself out to stop Cyclonus...
 
 Cyclonus almost laughs, "You talk of honor? This from the AUTOBOT who
 throws sand in the middle of battle?" Cyclonus casually reaches up to
 block Rodimus' rather clumsy attack with the buzzsaw and he was about
 to say something else when Rodimus' rocket catches him full in the
 chest, sending him sailing through the air! He lands on the ground on
 his back and continues to slide, making a deep furrow in the sand. 
 
 Cyclonus rose from the ground, his chestplate cracked, dented and
 scortched from Rodimus' attack. He nodded as he turned slightly and
 pointed at Rodimus, "You decieve yourself Rodimus." his voice is deep
 and powerful, easily filling the distance between them. His mouth
 quirked into a smile devoid of even the slightlest hint of humor, "You
 are loosing yourself! Even now you are becoming what you strive to
 destroy, a warrior who will stoop to any means to achieve victory and
 you justify it by mere words."
 
 Cyclonus shook his head almost in sadness, "If I were Galvatron perhaps
 I would applaud you." His optics focused on Rodimus, "but I am not so I
 can give you only pity, and perhaps the only other thing of honor: A
 warrior's DEATH!"
 
 Cyclonus fires a missile, it flares once, flames bursting from behind
 it as it streaks at Rodimus prime!
 
 Preston
 (Cyclonus)
